### Transfer Technology
### Automatically generated by Yard1's transfer_technology generator, for Equestria at War
### PREV is the giver, THIS is the reciever

			set_technology = {
				popup = no
				main_battle_tank_spaa_a = 1
			}
		}

			limit = {

					}
				}

					}
				}
			
				if = {
					limit = {
						PREV = {
							has_tech = tech_infiltrators_si3_lar
						}
					}
					set_technology = {
					popup = no
						tech_infiltrators_si3_lar = 1
					}
				}
			
				if = {
					limit = {
						PREV = {
							has_tech = tech_infiltrators_si4_lar
						}
					}
					set_technology = {
					popup = no
						tech_infiltrators_si4_lar = 1
					}
				}
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = {
				has_deer_race_tech = yes
			}

				}
			}

				construction_d = 1
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = {
				PREV = {
					has_tech = excavation_d
				}
			}
			set_technology = {
				popup = no
				excavation_d = 1
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					has_tech = streamlined_line
					is_researching_technology = streamlined_line
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					PREV = {
						has_tech = flexible_line
					}
				}
				set_technology = {
				popup = no
					flexible_line = 1
				}
			}

			if = {
				limit = {
					PREV = {
						has_tech = flexible_line_a
					}
				}
				set_technology = {
				popup = no
					flexible_line_a = 1
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					has_tech = flexible_line
					is_researching_technology = flexible_line
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					PREV = {
						has_tech = streamlined_line
					}
				}
				set_technology = {
				popup = no
					streamlined_line = 1
				}
			}

			if = {
				limit = {

						has_tech = streamlined_line_a
					}

					streamlined_line_a = 1
				}
			}
		}

				}
			}

				popup = no
				mountaineers_c = 1
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = {
				PREV = {
					has_tech = support_weapons_a
				}
			}
			set_technology = {
				popup = no
				support_weapons_a = 1
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = {
				PREV = {
					has_tech = support_weapons_b
				}
			}
			set_technology = {
				popup = no
				support_weapons_b = 1
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = {
				PREV = {
					has_tech = night_vision_a
				}
			}
			set_technology = {
				popup = no
				night_vision_a = 1
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = {
				PREV = {
					has_tech = support_weapons_c
				}
			}
			set_technology = {
				popup = no
				support_weapons_c = 1
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					has_tech = superior_firepower
					has_tech = trench_warfare
					has_tech = mass_assault
					is_researching_technology = superior_firepower
					is_researching_technology = trench_warfare
					is_researching_technology = mass_assault
				}
			}

			if = {
				limit = {
					PREV = {
						has_tech = mobile_warfare
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						PREV = { is_ai = yes } original_tag = GRF
					}
					add_tech_bonus = {
						name = land_doc_bonus
						bonus = 3
						uses = 1
						category = land_doctrine
					}
					else = {
						set_technology = {
				popup = no
							mobile_warfare = 1
						}
					}
				}
			}

			if = {
				limit = {
					PREV = {
						has_tech = delay
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						PREV = { is_ai = yes } original_tag = GRF
					}
					add_tech_bonus = {
						name = land_doc_bonus
						bonus = 3
						uses = 1
						category = land_doctrine
					}
					else = {
						set_technology = {
				popup = no
							delay = 1
						}
					}
				}
			}

			if = {
				limit = {
					PREV = {
						has_tech = elastic_defence
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						PREV = { is_ai = yes } original_tag = GRF
					}
					add_tech_bonus = {
						name = land_doc_bonus
						bonus = 3
						uses = 1
						category = land_doctrine
					}
					else = {
						set_technology = {
				popup = no
							elastic_defence = 1
						}
					}
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = {
						has_tech = armored_spearhead
						is_researching_technology = armored_spearhead
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						PREV = {
							has_tech = mobile_infantry
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							PREV = { is_ai = yes } original_tag = GRF
						}
						add_tech_bonus = {
							name = land_doc_bonus
							bonus = 3
							uses = 1
							category = land_doctrine
						}
						else = {
							set_technology = {
				popup = no
								mobile_infantry = 1
							}
						}
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						PREV = {
							has_tech = mass_motorization
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							PREV = { is_ai = yes } original_tag = GRF
						}
						add_tech_bonus = {
							name = land_doc_bonus
							bonus = 3
							uses = 1
							category = land_doctrine
						}
						else = {
							set_technology = {
				popup = no
								mass_motorization = 1
							}
						}
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						PREV = {
							has_tech = mechanised_offensive
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							PREV = { is_ai = yes } original_tag = GRF
						}
						add_tech_bonus = {
							name = land_doc_bonus
							bonus = 3
							uses = 1
							category = land_doctrine
						}
						else = {
							set_technology = {
				popup = no
								mechanised_offensive = 1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = {
						has_tech = mobile_infantry
						is_researching_technology = mobile_infantry
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						PREV = {
							has_tech = armored_spearhead
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							PREV = { is_ai = yes } original_tag = GRF
						}
						add_tech_bonus = {
							name = land_doc_bonus
							bonus = 3
							uses = 1
							category = land_doctrine
						}
						else = {
							set_technology = {
				popup = no
								armored_spearhead = 1
							}
						}
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						PREV = {
							has_tech = schwerpunk
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							PREV = { is_ai = yes } original_tag = GRF
						}
						add_tech_bonus = {
							name = land_doc_bonus
							bonus = 3
							uses = 1
							category = land_doctrine
						}
						else = {
							set_technology = {
				popup = no
								schwerpunk = 1
							}
						}
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						PREV = {
							has_tech = blitzkrieg
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							PREV = { is_ai = yes } original_tag = GRF
						}
						add_tech_bonus = {
							name = land_doc_bonus
							bonus = 3
							uses = 1
							category = land_doctrine
						}
						else = {
							set_technology = {
				popup = no
								blitzkrieg = 1
							}
						}
					}

				limit = {
					PREV = {

								original_tag = OLE
							}
						}
						add_tech_bonus = {
							name = land_doc_bonus
							bonus = 3
							uses = 1
							category = land_doctrine
						}
						else = {
							set_technology = {
				popup = no
								deep_operations = 1
							}
						}
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						PREV = {
							has_tech = operational_concentration
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							PREV = { is_ai = yes } OR = {
								original_tag = NLR
								original_tag = OLE
							}
						}
						add_tech_bonus = {
							name = land_doc_bonus
							bonus = 3
							uses = 1
							category = land_doctrine
						}
						else = {
							set_technology = {
				popup = no
								operational_concentration = 1
							}
						}

				popup = no
							convoy_sailing_ti = 1
						}
					}
				}
			}

			if = {
				limit = {
					PREV = {
						has_tech = subsidiary_carrier_role_ti
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						PREV = { is_ai = yes } OR = {
							original_tag = NLR
							original_tag = OLE
						}
					}
					add_tech_bonus = {
						name = naval_doc_bonus
						bonus = 3
						uses = 1
						category = naval_doctrine
					}
					else = {
						set_technology = {
				popup = no
							subsidiary_carrier_role_ti = 1
						}
					}
				}
			}

				}

			if = {
				limit = {
					PREV = {
						has_tech = tech_diamond_dog_army2
					}
				}
				set_technology = {
					popup = no
					tech_diamond_dog_army2 = 1
				}
			}
	
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { 
						has_tech = tech_diamond_dog_army_atk3
						is_researching_technology = tech_diamond_dog_army_atk3
					}
					PREV = {
						has_tech = tech_diamond_dog_army_def3
					}
				}
				set_technology = {
					popup = no
					tech_diamond_dog_army_def3 = 1
				}
			}

				limit = {

						has_tech = tech_unicorn_ms

					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						PREV = {
							has_tech = tech_unicorn_th
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							OR = {
								original_tag = NLR
								original_tag = NMS
							}
						}
						set_technology = {
					popup = no
							tech_unicorn_ms = 1
						}
						else = {
							set_technology = {
					popup = no
								tech_unicorn_th = 1
							}
						}
					}
				}
	
				if = {
					limit = {
						PREV = {
							has_tech = tech_unicorn_th2
						}
					}

								tech_unicorn_th2 = 1

			}

			if = {
				limit = {
					PREV = {
						has_tech = modern_naval_mines
					}
				}
				set_technology = {
				popup = no
					modern_naval_mines = 1
				}
			}

			if = {
				limit = {
					PREV = {
						has_tech = airsweep_mines
					}
				}
				set_technology = {
				popup = no
					airsweep_mines = 1
				}
			}

			if = {
				limit = {
					PREV = {
						has_tech = mtg_transport
					}
				}
				set_technology = {
				popup = no
					mtg_transport = 1
				}
			}

			if = {
				limit = {
					PREV = {
						has_tech = mtg_landing_craft
					}
				}
				set_technology = {
				popup = no
					mtg_landing_craft = 1
				}
			}

			if = {
				limit = {
					PREV = {
						has_tech = mtg_tank_landing_craft
					}
				}
				set_technology = {
				popup = no
					mtg_tank_landing_craft = 1
				}
			}

			if = {
				limit = {
					PREV = {
						has_tech = panzerschiffe
					}
				}
				set_technology = {
				popup = no
					panzerschiffe = 1
				}
			}

			if = {
				limit = {
					PREV = {
						has_tech = torpedo_cruiser_mtg
					}
				}
				set_technology = {
				popup = no
					torpedo_cruiser_mtg = 1
				}
			}

			if = {
				limit = {
					PREV = {
						has_tech = pre_dreadnoughts
					}
				}
				set_technology = {
				popup = no
					pre_dreadnoughts = 1
				}
			}

			if = {
				limit = {
					PREV = {
						has_tech = coastal_defense_ships
					}
				}
				set_technology = {
				popup = no
					coastal_defense_ships = 1
				}
			}

			if = {
				limit = {
					PREV = {
						has_tech = cruiser_submarines
					}
				}
				set_technology = {
				popup = no
					cruiser_submarines = 1
				}
			}
		}

		fix_weapon_techs = yes
	}
}
